nsgl.stringify

Interface Stringifyable


  • public interface Stringifyable

    Title: Stringifiable

    Description: An object that can be Stringified (stored) into a String

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CHARSET
      Default charset used by NSGL

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addCast(java.lang.Object caller, Stringifier cast)
      Adds an Stringifying method for the given object
      static Stringifyable cast(java.lang.Object obj)
      Cast an object to Stringifyable, if possible
      static void init()
      Initializes default comparison methods
      default java.io.InputStream is()
      Creates an InputStream for the object's Stringified version
      static Stringifier stringifier(java.lang.Object obj)
      Obtains the associated stringifying method of the object
      java.lang.String stringify()
      Stringifies the object

        Default charset used by NSGL

    • Method Detail

      • stringify

        java.lang.String stringify()
        Stringifies the object
        Returns:
        An stringified version of the object

      • is

        default java.io.InputStream is()
        Creates an InputStream for the object's Stringified version

        An InputStream for the object's Stringified version

        static void init()
        Initializes default comparison methods

      • stringifier

        static Stringifier stringifier(java.lang.Object obj)
        Obtains the associated stringifying method of the object
        Parameters:
        obj - Object that will get its stringifying method
        Returns:
        The associated stringifying method of the object

      • cast

        static Stringifyable cast(java.lang.Object obj)
        Cast an object to Stringifyable, if possible
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be casted to Stringifyable
        Returns:
        A Stringifyable version of the given object, null otherwise

      • addCast

        static void addCast(java.lang.Object caller,
                    Stringifier cast)
        Adds an Stringifying method for the given object
        Parameters:
        caller - Object that will register its stringifying method
        cast - Casting method
